com.neuvector

Class Scanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.neuvector.Scanner

  • public class Scanner
extends java.lang.Object
    NeuVector Scanner APIs can scan security vulnerabilities of the local docker image or the docker registry.

    To scan the docker local image, you can call the API Scanner.scanLocalImage()

    To scan the docker registry, you can call the API com.neuvector.Scanner.scanRegistry()

    It returns a Java bean object com.neuvector.model.ScanRepoReportData

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Scanner()

      To scan a docker local repository or image and return a java bean object of com.neuvector.model.ScanRepoReportData.

      • scanRegistry

        public static ScanRepoReportData scanRegistry(java.lang.String registryURL,
                                              java.lang.String registryUsername,
                                              java.lang.String registryPassword,
                                              java.lang.String repository,
                                              java.lang.String repositoryTag,
                                              java.lang.String license,
                                              java.lang.String nvScannerImage,
                                              java.lang.String nvRegistryURL,
                                              java.lang.String nvRegistryUser,
                                              java.lang.String nvRegistryPassword)
        To scan a docker registry and return a java bean object of com.neuvector.model.ScanRepoReportData.
        Parameters:
        registryURL - The registry to be scanned
        registryUsername - The login user of the registry to be scanned
        registryPassword - The login password of the registry to be scanned
        repository - The repository to be scanned
        repositoryTag - The tag of the repository to be scanned
        license - The license to run NeuVector Scanner
        nvScannerImage - The name of the NeuVector Scanner Image
        nvRegistryURL - The registry url from which to pull NeuVector Scanner image
        nvRegistryUser - The login user of the registry url
        nvRegistryPassword - The login password of the registry url
        Returns:
        ScanRepoReportData

      • scanLocalImage

        public static ScanRepoReportData scanLocalImage(java.lang.String imageName,
                                                java.lang.String imageTag,
                                                java.lang.String license,
                                                java.lang.String nvScannerImage,
                                                java.lang.String nvRegistryURL,
                                                java.lang.String nvRegistryUser,
                                                java.lang.String nvRegistryPassword)
        To scan a docker local repository or image and return a java bean object of com.neuvector.model.ScanRepoReportData.
        Parameters:
        imageName - The name of the local image which is going to be scanned
        imageTag - The local image tag
        license - The license to run NeuVector Scanner
        nvScannerImage - The name of the NeuVector Scanner Image
        nvRegistryURL - The registry url from which to pull NeuVector Scanner image
        nvRegistryUser - The login user of the registry url
        nvRegistryPassword - The login password of the registry url
        Returns:
        ScanRepoReportData
